Question: H.P.B. Optoelectronics., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
H.P.B. Optoelectronics

Product: Ultrasonic Lens Cleaning Products with Instant Clear View System (ICVS)

- Specializes in automotive optoelectronics applications
- Provides OEM/ODM solutions for optics, camera modules, imaging algorithms, and system integration
- Offers ultrasonic lens cleaning products with ICVS, protecting camera lens from droplets, ice, fog, snow, and light dusts
- Develops Automotive Ethernet and LiDAR Lite solutions for self-driving and electric vehicle markets
